description:
William is a young gay man who recently came out of the closet. He's single and has never had a boyfriend.
I had spoken with him on the phone a couple of times, and we finally agreed to meet at a local park.
He's very soft spoken — a hot mix of bookworm and gymnast.
"How long have you been doing gymnastics?" I asked.
"Since I was 8."
"Can you show me some?"
He took his shirt and shoes off and did a few moves. He's really quite good!
He was a little out of breath when I asked, "How many guys have you been with?"
"Ummm, 4 or 5 maybe."
"Have you ever been with a girl?" I smiled.
"Yuck. No."
"Have you ever been fucked?" I asked.
"Yeah."
"I bet you can really get your legs up in the air!" You know me, always the direct approach.
He smiled and looked away. I was embarrassing him but that's part of the fun...
title: William
